title: Ezra1122
author: Ezra1122
content: We need a cool designer to create MP4,Gif,Html banners, who does really enticing and unusual work. Please attach an examples of your work.

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: I would like to suggest Jayce Service: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1142066.0Take a look there you will see an extensive list of his past works. Basically, he could help you to create the most excellent-looking HTML banner.

comments.author: bets21
comments.body: Quote from: Ezra1122 on August 23, 2022, 05:44:16 PMWe need a cool designer to create MP4,Gif,Html banners, who does really enticing and unusual work. Please attach an examples of your work.Check pm

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Quote from: sujonali1819 on August 23, 2022, 05:50:52 PMI would like to suggest Jayce Service: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1142066.0Take a look there you will see an extensive list of his past works. Basically, he could help you to create the most excellent-looking HTML banner. Yea, I can vouch for Jayce. I have been working with him for a long time and he has delivered what he promised. My clients are always happy with his work. I can remember even he made all kinds of banners for me including HTML. So OP might select him if he needs quality work rather than cheap.
